Legal_Issue: Credibility assessment and risk of religious persecution
Credibility_Assessment: Testimony found implausible due to inconsistencies and omissions
Legal_Provision: Section 97 or 98 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inconsistencies in testimony and lack of supporting documentary evidence
Proceeding_Type: Refugee claim determination and subsequent judicial review
Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the Board erred in credibility assessment and persecution risk analysis
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, Section 101(1)(a)
Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of credible evidence supporting religious persecution claim
Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistencies and omissions in applicant's testimony
Procedural_Fairness: Assessed as met by the Board
Credibility_Issues: Significant inconsistencies and material omissions in testimony

Omission_Type: Failure to disclose relevant details in testimony
